Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the applicant's refugee claim was reasonably rejected due to credibility issues
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: RPD found applicant not credible due to false identity, omissions, and inconsistent evidence
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Refugee protection based on fear of persecution
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Refugee hearing and subsequent judicial review
Crimes.Application_Error: Falsified identity upon arrival, omitted key details in forms
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Credible evidence required to support refugee claim
Crimes.Application_Factor: Use of false identity and inconsistent statements
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Claim rejected due to lack of credibility
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Judicial review dismissed, RPD decision upheld
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: False identity, omission of material facts, inconsistent documentation
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistent dates in letters, lack of corroborative evidence
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: RPD provided opportunity to respond; process followed
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Applicant used cousin’s identity upon entry
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Significant inconsistencies in testimony and documents
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Applicant challenged reasonableness of RPD decision
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to disclose true identity and material events

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Refugee claim credibility and evidentiary sufficiency
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the RPD erred in rejecting the claim based on credibility and insufficient evidence
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: RPD doubted credibility due to false identity and inconsistent evidence
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Refugee status based on alleged risk upon return
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: False representation at port of entry and lack of corroboration
Crimes.Application_Error: Claimed to be cousin, failed to disclose true identity initially
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Judicial review dismissed, no question certified
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Burden on claimant to prove credibility and need for protection
Crimes.Application_Factor: Use of false identity and discrepancies in documentation
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Claim denied due to credibility concerns
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Was the RPD’s credibility finding reasonable?
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: False identity at entry and failure to provide consistent evidence
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Discrepancies in dates, lack of supporting documentation
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Applicant had opportunity to present case; procedural rights upheld
Crimes.Document_Fraud: Presented as another person upon arrival
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Material inconsistencies in narrative and documents
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of RPD’s assessment
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Adjudication of credibility in refugee claims
Crimes.Omission_Type: Non-disclosure of true identity and background details
